column4: So I installed the Intel i7 980X CPU (3.33 gHz, 6 cores with hyperthreading) on my server, but /proc/cpuinfo is reporting each of 12 cores at only 1600mHz. That doesn't seem right
it'll clock down the CPUs when they're not used to save power.
but it's still aware of their full potential when they're needed? is there any way I can clock them up to convince myself of that?
do something that'll keep them busy and check. play a media file or something
